software: An aerial view shows the Costa Concordia as it lies on its side next to Giglio Island taken from an Italian navy helicopter in this August 26, 2013 file photo. The wreck of the Costa Concordia cruise liner is set to be refloated within 10 days, to be towed away from the Italian island where it ran aground and capsized two and a half years ago, the group organising the removal said on July 3, 2014. REUTERS/Alessandro Bianchi/Files (ITALY - Tags: DISASTER MARITIME TRANSPORT)

photoshop:Headline: File photo of an aerial view of the Costa Concordia as it lies on its side next to Giglio Island taken from an Italian navy helicopter
